CHAT.comment: JENNIFER GRATZ and PATRICK HAMACHER Petitioners v. LEE BOLLINGER, et al., Respondents.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KIRK O. KOLBO ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN PAYTON ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF KIRK O. KOLBO ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:02 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
